$WmMPID_カンナ女,ch05_34_Kannna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Papa, I'm so glad that we get to
practice together!$k$pPlease, Papa, promise you'll always
be with me, even after I grow up.$k$p$WmMPID_カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Of course I will, Kana. We're a
family, and families stay together.$k$p$Sbs1000|
